verses.verse: The <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

As it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> my <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> your <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G2680>prepare<s%> your <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> you.

The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2090>Prepare<s%> you the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> his <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>
<S%G2491>John<s%> did <S%G907>baptize<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> and <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> for the <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And there <S%G1607>went<s%> out to him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5561>land<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> and they of <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> of him in the <S%G4215>river<s%> of <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G1843>confessing<s%> their <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with <S%G2574>camel's<s%> <S%G2359>hair,<s%> and with a <S%G2223>girdle<s%> of a <S%G1193>skin<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> his <S%G3751>loins;<s%> and he did <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> and <S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G3192>honey;<s%>

And <S%G2784>preached,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> There <S%G2064>comes<s%> one <S%G2478>mightier<s%> than I <S%G3694>after<s%> me, the <S%G2438>lace<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to <S%G2955>stoop<s%> down and <S%G3089>unloose.<s%>
I <S%G3303>indeed<s%> have <S%G907>baptized<s%> you with <S%G5204>water:<s%> but he shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> you with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> from <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and was <S%G907>baptized<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> in <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G305>coming<s%> up out of the <S%G5204>water,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G4977>opened,<s%> and the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> on him:

And there <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> saying, You <S%G1488>are<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am <S%G2106>well<s%> <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>
And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1544>drives<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And he was <S%G1563>there<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan;<s%> and was with the <S%G2342>wild<s%> <S%G2342>beasts;<s%> and the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to him.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G3860>put<s%> in <S%G3860>prison,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

And <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> and the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1448>at<s%> <S%G1448>hand:<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> you, and believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G1722><s%> the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

Now as he <S%G4043>walked<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea:<s%> for they were <S%G231>fishers.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1205>Come<s%> you <S%G3694>after<s%> me, and I will <S%G4160>make<s%> you to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> they <S%G863>forsook<s%> their <S%G1350>nets,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And when he had <S%G4260>gone<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G4260>farther<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G846>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were in the <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> their <S%G1350>nets.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> them: and they <S%G863>left<s%> their <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> in the <S%G4143>ship<s%> with the <S%G3411>hired<s%> <S%G3411>servants,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> him.

And they <S%G1531>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum;<s%> and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1321>taught.<s%>

And they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G1322>doctrine:<s%> for he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> them as one that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> and not as the <S%G1122>scribes.<s%>
And there was in their <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> with an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> and he <S%G349>cried<s%> out,

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G1439>Let<s%> us <S%G1439>alone;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> have we to do with you, you <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth?<s%> are you <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> us? I <S%G1492>know<s%> you <S%G5101>who<s%> you <S%G1488>are,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> One of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5392>Hold<s%> your <S%G5392>peace,<s%> and <S%G1831>come<s%> out of him.
And when the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> had <S%G4682>torn<s%> him, and <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> he <S%G1831>came<s%> out of him.

And they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2284>amazed,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they <S%G4802>questioned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G848>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> thing is <S%G3778>this?<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> is <S%G5124>this?<s%> for with <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2004>commands<s%> he <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> and they do <S%G5219>obey<s%> him.

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> his <S%G189>fame<s%> <S%G1831>spread<s%> <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4066>region<s%> <S%G4066>round<s%> <S%G4066>about<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

And <S%G2112>immediately,<s%> when they were <S%G1831>come<s%> out of the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> they <S%G2064>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> with <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John.<s%>
But <S%G4613>Simon's<s%> <S%G3994>wife's<s%> <S%G3994>mother<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%> <S%G4445>sick<s%> of a <S%G4445>fever,<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> they <S%G3004>tell<s%> him of her.

And he <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>took<s%> her by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G1453>lifted<s%> her up; and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> her, and she <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to them.

And at <S%G3798>even,<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> did <S%G1416>set,<s%> they <S%G5342>brought<s%> to him <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G2560>diseased,<s%> <S%G2192><s%> and them that were <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with <S%G1139>devils.<s%>
And <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G1996>gathered<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

And he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G2192>sick<s%> <S%G2560><s%> of <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases,<s%> and <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>devils;<s%> and <S%G863>suffered<s%> not the <S%G1140>devils<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1492>knew<s%> him.

And in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> <S%G450>rising<s%> up a <S%G3029>great<s%> while <S%G1773>before<s%> <S%G1773>day,<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>solitary<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4336>prayed.<s%>
And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> and they that were with him <S%G2614>followed<s%> <S%G2614>after<s%> him.
And when they had <S%G2147>found<s%> him, they <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3956>All<s%> men <S%G2212>seek<s%> for you.

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Let us <S%G71>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2192>next<s%> <S%G2969>towns,<s%> that I may <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2546>also:<s%> for therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> I forth. <S%G1831><s%>
And he <S%G2784>preached<s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils.<s%>

And there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> to him, <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> him, and <S%G1120>kneeling<s%> down to him, and <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G2309>will,<s%> you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> me <S%G2511>clean.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4697>moved<s%> with <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> <S%G1614>put<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, I <S%G2309>will;<s%> be you clean. <S%G2511><s%>
And as soon as he had <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> from him, and he was <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>
And he straightly <S%G1690>charged<s%> him, and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1544>sent<s%> him <S%G1544>away;<s%>

And <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3708>See<s%> you <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> to <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G3367>man:<s%> but <S%G5217>go<s%> your way, <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest,<s%> and <S%G4374>offer<s%> for your <S%G2512>cleansing<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to them.

But he <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>publish<s%> it <S%G4183>much,<s%> and to <S%G1310>blaze<s%> <S%G1310>abroad<s%> the <S%G3056>matter,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G5320>openly<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> but was <S%G1854>without<s%> in <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>places:<s%> and they <S%G2064>came<s%> to him from <S%G3836>every<s%> <S%G3836>quarter.<s%>
